parsed.explanation:

2. Added <BIBL> tags around "Reich der Todten" to properly mark it as a bibliographic item.
3. Fixed corrupted text "frantz√∂sisch" to "frantzösisch" (French).
4. Fixed corrupted text "B√ºcheren" to "Bücheren" (books).
5. Fixed corrupted text "B√ºcher" to "Bücher" (books).
6. Fixed corrupted text "Commi-√üion" to "Commission".
